subject: [cc-devel] Media Hosting Wishlist
body:
Heya, Mike and I have been working up this document as a best
practice/wishlist of media hosting features a site should have at this
point in time to best support Creative Commons licensing.

Would you all take a look at it, make some edits on it, possibly
add/subtract and criticize what is up there please?

I wanted to get the ball rolling on this so that we can all use it as a
guide for what a site like YouTube or any User Generate Content site
should implement to support CC licensing and standards.

http://wiki.creativecommons.org/Media_Hosting_Wishlist

Thoughts?

Jon
